system.availability: Shoulder-mounted crane, extends to 1.5m, gives +20 to Strength Tests, and can be locked to an anchour point as a free action. Can also be used as a 1d5+2 I Primitive club. Can't be used for fine manipulation.
system.cost: Legally, limited to members of the Adeptus Mechanicus, requires relevent Mechadendrite Use Talent and Cyber-Mantle. May not have more Mechadendrites than Toughness Bonus
